DESCRIPTION: Reduce #yFoxfire by #bX. Cannot reduce #yFoxfire below #b1. Cannot be used while you have #yBurnout.
Suzuran's secondary energy resource. Don't let it reach zero!
At the start of turn, the owner takes damage equal to the stacks, then increases #yFox Curse stacks by #b8. Before a card applies Fox Curse, it triggers this start-of-turn effect once.
Collect Ofuda to exchange for rewards after combat. (Ofuda count persists between combats.)
At the end of your turn, gain X #yBlock. When you lose HP from attack damage, reduce #yPlanted-Armor by #b1.
Gain X #yStrength. At the end of your turn, lose X #yStrength.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Gain X #yDexterity. At the end of your turn, lose X #yDexterity.
If your #yFoxfire is X or lower, trigger additional effect. Cannot be used while you have #yBurnout .
